node.address: Centro Calle de la Mantilla no 3-49, Calle 36 no 3-49, Centro Historico , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
Be lounge is Located in the center of Cartagena on Calle de la Mantilla, a few meters from Plaza de Santo Domingo, 2 blocks from the walls and café del Mar.

This property offers free WiFi and a sun terrace Also, guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Some units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Rooms have a shared bathroom fitted with a shower.

Be Lounge Hostel features a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Cartagena de Indias. Located around 600 m from Bolivar Park, the hostel with free WiFi is also 700 m away from Cartagena's Gold Museum. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests.
Palace of the Inquisition is 700 m from Be Lounge Hostel, while Cartagena's Walls is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.
Centro is a great choice for travellers interested in restaurants, architecture and food.

description.description: Be Lounge Hostel is located in the Heart of the Walled City of Cartagena, set in a 400-year-colonial house. This property is a house with two floors, the first one with a local restaurant and a garden bar and the second floor where the rooms are located is surrounded by a colonial balcony. There is also a terrace where people can meet and take a suntan or see the stars at night. The look of the house is made with a vintage decoration with lots of cool old details that makes us uniques. We want you to experience the idyllic atmosphere that Cartagena gives In Be Lounge, we want you to write and live your own history.
